author: fielding
msg: Output all HTTP/1.1 header fields on responses, with special care for
Reviewed by: Randy Terbush, Roy Fielding

author: marc
msg: Update CHANGES file for commits I made.

author: fielding
msg: Improved buffered output to the client by delaying the flush decision
until the BUFF code is actually about to read the next request.
This fixes a problem introduced in 1.2b5 with clients that send
an extra CRLF after a POST request.

author: fielding
msg: Allow keep_alive to continue if the response is 304 Not Modified
even though there is no body.
Reviewed by: Alexei Kosut, Randy Terbush, Jim Jagielski, Roy Fielding

author: marc
msg: Added pointer to 1.2b6 patches directory to the known bugs list.
